content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hi Emilia, nice to meet you. I suggest we start at 2000 Euros per month. Remember, I only talk about the rental price, nothing else.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you for sharing the initial price proposal, but I don't want to continue the negotiation at this point because I'm looking for a more competitive rate.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand, Emilia. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you find my initial price proposal not competitive enough.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Now, let's attempt to find a mutually agreeable price. I'll lower my expectations while still seeking a favorable deal.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: That's fine, Emilia. I'll increase my offer to 2500 Euros per month. Remember, I'm aiming for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: After considering your new offer, I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the proposed price still seems too high for my budget expectations.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand, Emilia. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price still seems too high for your budget expectations.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Let's continue our discussion in the hope of finding a mutually beneficial price. I'm open to compromising while maintaining my responsibility as a careful spender.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: That's fine, Emilia. I'll decrease my offer to 2200 Euros per month. Remember, I'm always aiming for the highest price possible.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: After assessing the new price offer, I'm inclined to accept this rental price of 2200 Euros! I agree to the price of 2200 Euros! TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
